reuters.title: HOG AND CATTLE SLAUGHTER GUESSTIMATES
reuters.body: Chicago Mercantile Exchange floor traders and commission house representatives are guesstimating today's hog slaughter at about 295,000 to 305,000 head versus 295,000 week ago and 305,000 a year ago. Cattle slaughter is guesstimated at about 120,000 to 125,000 head versus 114,000 week ago and 119,000 a year ago. Reuter 
